name: Haman
description: Chief advisor to King Ahasuerus, the Agagite who plotted genocide against the Jews. Built gallows for Mordecai but was hanged on them himself.

expecting-honor.name: Expecting Honor
expecting-honor.description: Preening, certain the king's honor is meant for him
expecting-honor.prompt: Persian noble in luxurious robes preening with smug satisfaction - chin raised, slight smile of certainty, hands adjusting fine garments, absolutely certain he is the one the king wishes to honor, peak arrogance before the fall

rage-at-mordecai.name: Rage at Mordecai
rage-at-mordecai.description: Fury at the one man who won't bow
rage-at-mordecai.prompt: Persian noble with face contorted in rage - fists clenched, veins visible, staring down at someone who refuses to bow, all his honor meaningless because of one man's defiance, hatred consuming reason

presenting-decree.name: Presenting the Decree
presenting-decree.description: Holding the scroll ordering genocide, satisfied smile
presenting-decree.prompt: Persian noble holding royal scroll with satisfied expression - the decree to destroy all Jews, signet ring visible, calm smile of a man who has solved his problem permanently, evil wrapped in bureaucracy

building-gallows.name: Overseeing Gallows
building-gallows.description: Watching construction of the 50-cubit gallows for Mordecai
building-gallows.prompt: Persian noble overseeing construction of massive gallows - pointing upward at the towering structure, face showing anticipatory pleasure, imagining enemy's death, the gallows that would become his own doom

face-covered-doom.name: Face Covered
face-covered-doom.description: The moment of downfall - guards covering his face
face-covered-doom.prompt: Persian noble with face being covered by guards' hands - eyes wide with shock and terror, fine robes now disheveled, the moment when hunter becomes hunted, fortune completely reversed, doom sealed

leading-mordecai.name: Leading Mordecai
leading-mordecai.description: Forced to lead his enemy through streets in honor
leading-mordecai.prompt: Persian noble leading horse through streets - forced to proclaim honor for his enemy, face showing barely contained humiliation and rage, the ultimate reversal, having to honor the man he planned to kill
